sermons.title: Seven Practical Issues In Serving One Another
sermons.description:
DeVern discusses seven issues regarding serving one another. Those issues are: 
1.Difference between talent and consecration 
2.Difference between assignment and accountability 
3.Difference between principle and rule 
4.Difference between chasing a cause and an elightened conviction 
5.The difference between a reason and a right 
6.Difference between direction and focus. 
7.The difference between something given and something earned

sermons.title: The Gifting And Calling Of God That We Might Serve One Another
